actions: Kills parasites, clears Heat, relives Fire toxicity, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.

symptoms: Early stage: Dermatitis with a pruritic erythematous papulovesicular lesion at the site of the larval invasion Episodic coughing Asthma Fever Eosinophilia Blood tinged sputum
